doc.name: ThrowException
doc.description: An actor that throws an IllegalActionException when it receives a true token on any input channel. The message reported in the exception is given by the message parameter. By default, inputs are read and checked in the fire() method, but if throwInPostfire is set to true, then they will be checked in postfire() only.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
doc.property: True to throw the model error in the postfire method. False to throw in fire. This is a boolean that defaults to false.
The message reported in the exception, which is a string that defaults to "Model triggered an exception".
